title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The current bug report lacks a description of the issue.
OB: The observed behavior is not mentioned in the bug report.
EB: This issue should have at most one redraw for each visible line during text changes with word wrap enabled. However, multiple redraws are occurring in the current implementation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText component.
2. Change the text content in the StyledText component.
3. Observe multiple redraws instead of a maximum of one redraw per visible line.
